posts.title: Neighborhood Cleanup This Saturday
posts.body: We are meeting at the community center at 9am. Gloves and bags provided. Everyone welcome.
posts.author: admin

comments.body: I can bring extra supplies and water.

posts.title: Looking for Mentors in Math & Science
posts.body: If you can spare 1 hour/week to help students, please reply. We especially need algebra and biology support.
posts.author: user

board.title: Food Pantry Restock Needed
board.body: We need canned goods and hygiene kits this week. Drop-offs are open 10am–4pm.
board.author: admin

board.title: Community Garden Volunteers
board.body: Looking for 3–5 volunteers to help with planting on Sunday.
board.author: user
